name: 5 seconds of fire
description:
5 seconds of fire is a fast-paced exploration game about exploring caves with only a torch, speed and agility.

Find all 5 fire orbs to keep your torch lit, complete the level and explore a whole new cave.

Use A and D to move.

Press SPACE to jump.

Move the mouse around to point your torch.

Pick up all the fire orbs in the cave to keep your torch lit.

This game, including the programming, art and sound, was developed entirely by Ajmal Rizni
